name: Bellowsaint
description: Towering and broad, the Bellowsaint is a mobile altar of spore-pressure and resonance. Its hollowed lungs emit thunderous exhalations that rupture air and bone alike, calling the Bloom to wake through brute breath alone.
abilities: Spore Breath: When this model is activated, choose a point within 6". All models within 3" of that point must make a Resolve test. Models that fail suffer -1 to their Toughness until the end of the round.
Fungal Mass: This model counts as having 2 models for the purposes of claiming objectives.
